name: Summer Girl Fashionable for the Beach
name_original: Summer Girl Fashionable for the Beach
description:
Alicia is going to go to the beach with her friends, she will enjoy her holidays on the beach and in the sun. She loves to be tanned. We are going to dress Alicia with the latest fashion in bathing suits.
Also, she must be cute for the beach party. Choose nice dresses or pants, some heels, and many other accessories, that every girl should use. She's going to be the prom queen.
There is a great variety of suits to combine as you like.

- Many bikinis
- A lot of dresses
- many tops
- many hairstyles, pants, skirts, shoes and more

Do you want to be a fashion designer?
Use your creativity to put together the best combinations.

Be a fashion designer and have fun with our dress up games for girls.

Dress up games for free.
